text: Harwood Heights is a village in Cook County, Illinois, United States. The population was 9,065 at the 2020 census. The current mayor is Arlene Jezierny. She is the second woman to serve as mayor in Harwood Heights, the first being Margaret Fuller.Village of Harwood Heights: Mayor Margaret Fuller . ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago
title: Harwood Heights, Illinois
